title: Hello i Need a big help....
body:
HI i have two laptops at home one is mac and one is toshiba
and the problem is both of my laptops don't run League of Legends right now...
in my mac if i click on the league of legends icon it does nothing nothing at all
nothing pops up or anything then if i double click it again it says another instant launcher is running do u want to terminate it
and does nothing again

and for my toshiba if i try downloading League of Legends because i normally play LOl on my Mac
it says PVP .Net Patcher Kernel has been stopped and it says close program 

what should i do please help...

thank you

replies.body: Why does everyone seem to post with stupid titles that give no info on what they need help with?

Hey 5Ri,

It'll probably be easiest to fix one computer at a time, so let's start with the Windows laptop. Can you try to disable any antivirus applications/firewalls that you may have running? This might include Windows Firewall, Ad-Aware, etc. Secondly, try to run the lol.launcher.admin.exe file in your League of Legends folder. Let me know if the launcher opens up after you've done these things.
